chapters.title: Prologue: Deceptive Appearances
chapters.info: Queen Tenobia si Bashere Kazadi, p. 21 (8)—Queen of Saldaea. She is tall for a woman with an overbold nose, but pretty. She has dark, deep, blue, slanted eyes. She is niece of her Marshal-General, Davram Bashere. See also Bashere, Davram t'Ghaline; Memara; Ramsin, Kalyan.
